name: Syndicate Network
desc: A haven for freebooters of all kinds. Pirate fleets will regularly launch from here.

name: War Syndicate HQ
desc: A professional face for what most would describe as shameless pillaging. The War Syndicate offers a haven to pirates throughout the factionâ€™s colonies.

name: Orbital Station - Ruster
desc:
A Rust Belt-style space station, featuring resilient drones and a heavy artillery battery.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestation - Ruster
desc:
A Rust Belt-style space station, augmented with additional combat modules. Twin artillery batteries are backed up by a significant missile and fighter complement.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Star Fortress - Ruster
desc:
A fortified Rust Belt-style battlestation, featuring durable armor, resilient defense drones and heavy firepower.

Must be reduced before invasions or bombardment can be attempted.

name: Raider Hideout
desc: In good times, merchants. In bad times, pirates. Outlaws operate out of this hideout, and in greater numbers if the market has low stability.

name: Armed Community
desc: Rusters take a very distributed approach to warfare, a bring-your-own-ship attitude to military procurement, and regard chain of command as largely optional. Large raiding parties can launch from the colony, and in greater numbers if stability is low.

name: War Syndicate HQ
desc: The War Syndicate puts a professional face on what some would describe as shameless pillaging. If colony stability is low entire pirate armadas may be launched from these facilities.
